verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> Yet<WH5750> will I bring<WH935> one<WH259> plague<WH5061> more on Pharaoh,<WH6547> and on Egypt;<WH4714> afterwards<WH310> <WH3651> he will let you go<WH7971> hence:<WH2088> when he shall let you go,<WH7971> he shall surely thrust<WH1644> you out hence<WH2088> altogether.<WH3617>

Speak<WH1696> now<WH4994> in the ears<WH241> of the people,<WH5971> and let every man<WH376> borrow<WH7592> of his neighbor,<WH7453> and every woman<WH802> of her neighbor,<WH7468> jewels<WH3627> of silver <WH3701>and jewels<WH3627> of gold.<WH2091>

And the LORD<WH3068> gave<WH5414> the people<WH5971> favor<WH2580> in the sight<WH5869> of the Egyptians.<WH4714> Moreover<WH1571> the man<WH376> Moses<WH4872> was very<WH3966> great<WH1419> in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> in the sight<WH5869> of Pharaoh's<WH6547> servants,<WH5650> and in the sight<WH5869> of the people.<WH5971>
And Moses<WH4872> said,<WH559> Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> About midnight<WH2676> <WH3915> will I go<WH3318> out into the middle<WH8432> of Egypt:<WH4714>

And all<WH3605> the firstborn<WH1060> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> shall die,<WH4191> from the firstborn<WH1060> of Pharaoh<WH6547> that sits<WH3427> on his throne,<WH3678> even to the firstborn<WH1060> of the maidservant<WH8198> that is behind<WH310> the mill;<WH7347> and all<WH3605> the firstborn<WH1060> of beasts.<WH929>

And there shall be a great<WH1419> cry<WH6818> throughout all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> such<WH834> as there was none<WH3808> like<WH3644> it, nor<WH3808> shall be like<WH3644> it any<WH3254> more.<WH3254>

But against any<WH3605> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> shall not a dog<WH3611> move<WH2782> his tongue,<WH3956> against man<WH376> or<WH5704> beast:<WH929> that you may know<WH3045> how that the LORD<WH3068> does put a difference<WH6395> between<WH996> the Egyptians<WH4714> and Israel.<WH3478>

And all<WH3605> these<WH428> your servants<WH5650> shall come<WH3381> down<WH3381> to me, and bow<WH7812> down<WH7812> themselves to me, saying,<WH559> Get<WH3318> you out, and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> that follow<WH7272> you: and after<WH310> that I will go<WH3318> out. And he went<WH3318> out from Pharaoh<WH6547> in a great<WH2750> anger.<WH639>
And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> Pharaoh<WH6547> shall not listen<WH8085> to you; that my wonders<WH4159> may be multiplied<WH7235> in the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

And Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> did<WH6213> all<WH3605> these<WH428> wonders<WH4159> before<WH6440> Pharaoh:<WH6547> and the LORD<WH3068> hardened<WH2388> Pharaoh's<WH6547> heart,<WH3820> so that he would not let the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> go<WH7971> out of his land.<WH776>
